title: Sit Button Stool
excerpt: [digg=http://www.digg.com/gadgets/Sit_Button_Stool]Do those three words seem rather random to you when put together like that? Normally they would to me to, however, I’ve found something that has caused me to giggle like a school girl. It’s a stool in the form of a keyboard button with the word “Sit” on it. See below.
